extendedInfo.description: The grass is growing rampant in the neighborhood, and there's only one man to call!Ladies and gentlemen - Meet CHARLIE and his souped-up mower.Join him in his Sunday work to clean up the neighborhood yard by yard, but watch out for POOPY DOGS, ANGRY HEDGEHOGS and other dangers.- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -GAME FEATURES:- THREE game modes:- 1) "Challenge Mode"- 2) "Arcade Mode"- 3) "Sweet Dreams" (Bonus Game)- Collect stars and improve your rank in Challenge Mode: 60 VARYING LAWNS to master- Climb the High Score Table in Arcade Mode: 8 LEVELS to beat- Keep Charlie sleeping in "Sweet Dreams", the BONUS GAME with fence-jumping sheep- Different control options- Donut Games' Collectors Icon #04- TRAINER mode for kids or if you'd like to practice- And much more...- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Enjoy another Donut Games release!

reviews.title: Addiction at its finest
reviews.comment: Thank you for finally coming to Google play! Only thing that could make this better is more levels since I\'ve completed them all! We love donut games!
reviews.author: Baby-Lin Scofield

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great game i love it.i play it everyday and if i loose i get ampted up again to pass the levels!
reviews.author: Alisha Atwood

reviews.title: Control Scheme Ruins The Fun
reviews.comment: Good game idea, however the swipe controls can get a bit unresponsive, and the directional keys are a joke.  Please place in a directional pad, and then this game is 5-stars
reviews.author: Justin Ng

reviews.title: This game needs work
reviews.comment: I try to turn and it keeps going and will not turn. I will also go behind an animal and it will turn around and end the game. It is just little stuff that gets annoying. I wish the creators of this game can and will fix this.
reviews.author: Destinee Moore

reviews.title: Great idea but
reviews.comment: I like the idea of the game and I would love to play it but, the swipe control of sluggish and sometimes doesn\'t work and the layout of the arrow keys are terrible and then some. I assume you guys wanted to try something new with the arrow layout, but it doesn\'t work. Make it a traditional layout
reviews.author: Mats Markussen

reviews.title: Really like it
reviews.comment: But it got some bugs in it. I run into a lot of hang ups and half the time the whole screen will scramble on me.
reviews.author: Dawn Wright

reviews.title: Sunday lawn
reviews.comment: THIS IS A AMAZING GAMES .. AND ITS ADDICTIVE LOL
reviews.author: henry hall

reviews.title: Contols ruin fun
reviews.comment: Worst controls multiplied by a crazy speed. Almost impossible to make tight turns at the speed and unresponsive makes the game harder than it would seem. Unistalled just for that
reviews.author: Andrew Diaz

reviews.title: Fun and addictive
reviews.comment: Great addictive game, just sometimes the controls a little laggy. But overall it\'s fantastic!
reviews.author: Sarah Osborne

reviews.title: Sooooo addictive
reviews.comment: Would be really good  but the controls are a joke. I LOVE this game !!! Its annoying when you almost get passed the level , but then the controls don\'t work and you crash into a hedgehog or something. :) Fix that one thing , and this would be a five star game  :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)
reviews.author: Emily Green

reviews.title: One of the best games ever
reviews.author: Renato Mandi\304\207

reviews.title: Alcatel tab
reviews.comment: awesome game but i have trouble wanting it to load comes up all the time that it is not responding, anyone know how to fix that? I have deleted it and reinstalled but still having same problems.
reviews.author: Tanya Brown

reviews.title: So much fun
reviews.comment: Reminds me of a more causal PAC man, a ton of fun! Another great donut game!
reviews.author: Steven Mello

reviews.title: I love this game BUT
reviews.comment: Played it for 3 days and I fell in love with this game and now it will not respond...you need to fix the problem...I\'m losing my mind because I can\'t play....fix it!!!!!
reviews.author: Carol Burt

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: This game is great I liked playing one APPLE but on android you can only see half of it and it doesn\'t listen when you put your finger on to turn it
reviews.author: Dylan JONES

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Purely amazing its so addictive you will never get bored!!!   download it now
reviews.author: Rebecca Cole

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Soooo adictive and very good. 1 mini problem does sometimes stop working but had this for 3 months ish but only done it a few times.
reviews.author: Izzy H

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This game is frustrating but fun. Having trouble with the counting sheep game. So hard!
reviews.author: Cindy Ly

reviews.title: I hate how it always says connection problem!! I think we get it
reviews.author: Marissa Cave
